title: new layout
content: I don't like my new layout - I presume from update. I can't move the line below messages up like I used to so I can't read messages below it. Everything looks too big. How can I get back to the plain old view. I have tried changing views
creator: doreenwanhalla

title: Ve složkách se v pohledu na zprávy nezobrazují posledně doručené zprávy.
content:
V nové verzi Supernova se zprávy nezobrazují po kliknutí na složku ty posledně doručené, ale fokus na zprávy skočí vždycky někam o trochu víš, takže musím rolovat níž na tu posledně doručenou. Když posunu všechny zprávy ze všech složek na posledně doručenou a program ukončím a znova spustím, tak se chyba zase opakuje.

Teď jsem ještě zkoušel klikat a rolovat na poslední zprávu všechny složky od první k poslední a pak to zopakovat bez ukončení programu a jakmile se se vrátím k první složce, tak jsou zase zobrazené zprávy o kus víš.

Nepomohlo ani když jsem klikl v každé složce na poslední doručenou zprávu a nechal si zobrazit její obsah a zpráva zůstala označená. Ani údržba složek.

V předchozí verzi NeSupernova to nědělalo.
creator: JPT_CZ

title: Package the source code into a deb package
content: I have 118 daily versions of the source code now. I want to package the source code into a deb package. What should I do?
creator: shiminfu98

title: modifying account setup
content:
I have a probably uncommon problem. 

       I'm migrating to a new computer. I set up the old accounts (3 of them) on the new computer from scratch.       Then later I wanted to move the old e-mails from inboxes & archives & drafts to the same accounts onto the new computer, and I did this by copying & pasting from old to new. (Old e-mails are important to me to keep track of long term interactions with people & companies.)      The result was I now have duplicates of the 3 accounts on the new installation of TBird. I would like to delete the new versions that I initially created with the installation. I've been observing, and both the new & old versions of the 3 accounts are receiving new e-mails and saving them, so I believe I can delete the new accounts without losing the inboxes & archives that came over from the old computer.      I've been searching the TBird help areas to no avail. But in the process I've realized I should have read them in the beginning. There's plenty of advice there that would have kept me from making this mistake.      Thanks for any help you can give me in resolving this confusing mess.

James Frazier, Marina, CA
creator: jfra2

title: Not receiving  emails on window 7 since update 25th Septe EST. but can send with the message below
content: The last message in my sent folder is 7.53pm 25th September. "Your message was sent but a copy was not placed in your sent folder (Sent) due to network or file access errors. You can retry or save the message locally to Local Folders/Sent-bpatullo@ozemail.com.au." I am not receiving any emails, I have on my phone and laptop But the windows 7 is desk top and the main one I use. Help needed Thank you

title: Deleting message, it drops down the page.
content: When I delete an email instead of going to the next message, it drops 1/2 down the page. Each time I delete one it varies on how many emails it will skip. Is there a settings to fix this or a known bug? Thanks
